<js>
try{
eval(result.match(/(var shortname[\s\S]+?)function[\s\S]+?<\/script>/)[1]);
if(npage!=totalpage){
if(displaytype=='st' && namehand!='')
result=namehand+"_"+(npage+1)+shortname;
else result="view.php?aid="+cid+"&pageno="+(npage+1);
}else result="";
}catch(e){result=java.getString("class.col-md-6 text-center@tag.a.2@href",true)}
</js>
